extendedInfo.description: This application was created to make a simple short list of advertisements.  If you want to open an app that will give you some quick ideas for your next purchases or apps to download then give this a try!There is a refresh button for the list so, if you aren't interested in the first set of ads, then simply refresh to get some more!keywords:Advertise , Ad , advertise , ad , Ads , ads , Google Ads , google ads , google ad , Google Ad , Ad Mob , push ads , advertisement
